title: Untitled
credit_line: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. William Block
provenance_text:
Zao Wou-Ki [1921-2013], Paris, France [1]. Mr. [1915-2005] and Mrs. William Block (Maxine Horton Block) [1920-2008], Pittsburgh, PA, by January 1963 until June 6, 2002; their gift to Carnegie Museum of Art, Pittsburgh, PA, June 2002.

Notes:
[1]. The Chinese artist lived and worked in Paris since 1948. He became a French citizen in 1964 (see The New York Times, April 11, 2013.)
[2].  Mr. and Mrs. William Block lent the painting to the exhibition "Art Since 1900 - Privately Owned in the Pittsburgh Area" held at Carnegie Institute January - February 1963.
